page.title: 03RECREATION - TEENAGERS
page.content: {2.TEENAGER' VIEWPOINT} { Like the children the teenagers hold the view that Bellshill does not cater for their age-group.They think that the facilities available are oriented mainly towards the older adults. Their suggestions as to what is required includes better shops, more discos for their age group,a cinema and a Sports centre. Their activities include sport of some description ,Bowling,Badminton,Walking They also list Youth Fellowship as part of their activities with school homework coming at the end. The say that Bellshill caters well for the Sporting interests of their age group but lacks any provision at the weekends for those to whom public houses are age-barred.
